schedule.name: AGDQ 2026 Pre-Show
schedule.description:
## Awesome Games Done Quick 2026

Join us as we kickoff AGDQ 2026, a week-long speedrunning marathon fundraising for the Prevent Cancer Foundation!

bids.name: Upgrade to All Red Tags
bids.full_name: Jet Set Radio -- Upgrade to All Red Tags
bids.description: Upgrade the category of the Jet Set Radio run to All Red Tags.
bids.shortdescription: Jet Set Radio\nUpgrade to All Red Tags

bids.name: Free the Hamsters
bids.full_name: Bat to the Heavens -- Free the Hamsters
bids.description: Those poor Hamsters. They deserve to be free.
bids.shortdescription: Bat to the Heavens\nFree the Hamsters

bids.name: Bonus Bone Dance Run
bids.full_name: Spyro 2: Ripto's Rage! -- Bonus Bone Dance Run
bids.description: If you wish to thank Mr Skeltal for healthy bones and calcium, why not donate towards making the Spyro 2 runner do the Bone Dance category? It involves a skeleton dancing.

bids.full_name: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers -- Ending Choice
bids.description: Choose which ending is obtained at the end of the Wuchang: Fallen Feathers run.

bids.name: TieDus or TeeDus?
bids.full_name: Final Fantasy X -- TieDus or TeeDus?
bids.description: The correct pronunciation of Tidus' name is a hotly debated topic among Final Fantasy X lore devotees. You can have your say. Whichever option is leading is the one that the runner Vermilion will need to use when referring to the character during the run.

bids.description: If met, Pac-Man will literally sit down and speedrun the game they're in. By which I mean, DThaiPome will dress up in a Pac-Suit for the race.

bids.name: Fight Yama, The White
bids.full_name: Path of Exile 2 -- Fight Yama, The White
bids.description: If met, Angormus will travel through the Isle of Kin, Volcanic Warrens, Eye of Hinekora, and the Halls of the Dead in order to fight Yama, the White. All for your viewing pleasure.
bids.shortdescription: Path of Exile 2\nFight Yama, The White

bids.name: Spare or Kill the Animals (Bosses)
bids.full_name: Path of Exile 2 -- Spare or Kill the Animals (Bosses)
bids.description: Just like Super Metroid, you can choose to save or kill the animals in Path of Exile 2. Except, the animals are Mighty Silverfist and The Blind Beast, and we kill them ourselves instead of the planet exploding. Choose wisely.
bids.shortdescription: Path of Exile 2\nSpare or Kill the Animals (Bosses)

bids.shortdescription: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker\nACE Showcase

bids.name: Upgrade to DLC
bids.full_name: Elden Ring Nightreign -- Upgrade to DLC
bids.description: If met, the Elden Ring Nightreign runners will run on the DLC map, and fight Dreglord Straghess, the hardest boss in Nightreign.

bids.name: Fight Zagreus
bids.full_name: Hades II -- Fight Zagreus
bids.description: If met, BehemothSteve will fight Zagreus if he shows up during the Hades II run, or if he doesn't she'll hunt him down specifically just to whoop him.

bids.name: Route Choice
bids.full_name: Hades II -- Route Choice
bids.description: As part of the Hades II run, we're able to decide which area the next map is played on. Whichever option is in the lead will be selected.

bids.name: Equip Barbed Bracelet
bids.full_name: BONUS GAME 4 — Hollow Knight: Silksong -- Equip Barbed Bracelet
bids.description: The Barbed Bracelet is an equippable tool in Hollow Knight: Silksong that makes the Hornet take double damage in exchange for a small damage buff. As you might imagine, this is not the most marathon safe tool to equip. But screw it, this is for charity.

bids.name: Pick-My-Main
bids.full_name: Pokémon Emerald -- Pick-My-Main
bids.description: Choose the Pokémon used by adef for the Pokémon Emerald run. All Gen 1-3 Pokémon are available, and the main will swap after each gym to whatever is highest.

options.name: Tate & Lize: Aggron
options.full_name: Pokémon Emerald -- Pick-My-Main -- Tate & Lize: Aggron

milestones.name: Bonus Snake vs Monkey Showcase
milestones.description: If met, MetalGlennSolid will show off the Snake vs Monkey mode that is included in Metal Gear Solid Delta after the main run.
milestones.short_description: MGSΔ: Snake Eater — Bonus Snake vs Monkey Showcase

milestones.name: Level 15 Showcase
milestones.description: Level 15 is the hardest level available in maimai. The runners will show off two of the three available Level 15 songs, 系ぎて (Tsunagite) and Xaleid◆scopiX after the main run.
milestones.short_description: maimai DX PRiSM PLUS - Level 15 Showcase

milestones.name: Unlock the Bonus Game
milestones.description: Add Donkey Kong Bananza to the schedule.
milestones.short_description: Unlock the Bonus Game - Donkey Kong Bananza

milestones.name: Chrono Trigger — Bonus NG+ Run
milestones.description: If met, Jerikandra will perform an additional Any% NG+ run after the main run!

milestones.name: $30 Million Total Raised for PCF
milestones.description: When we hit $1,473,393 this event, that would mean GDQ has raised a total of $30,000,000 for the Prevent Cancer Foundation.

milestones.name: Unlock the Bonus Game
milestones.description: Add a run of Hollow Knight: Silksong by Ceen to the schedule.
milestones.short_description: Unlock the Bonus Game - Hollow Knight: Silksong

milestones.name: Enable Shiny Mode
milestones.description: If met, adef will enable Shiny Mode, turning all of his main Pokémon shiny during the Pokémon Emerald run!

milestones.name: Fight Steven
milestones.description: If met, adef will throw down with the big bad of Pokémon Emerald, Steven, after the run concludes.
